snippet: Several companies and research labs are working on wearable robots to help disabled people walk or to make the human body superhuman.
abstract: Several companies like Ekso Bionics and research labs are working on wearable robots to help disabled people walk or to make the human body able to perform superhuman tasks; improvements in technology and materials are bringing wearable exoskeletons offering robotic assistance closer to being a realistic, powerful and affordable solution for the disabled.
lead_paragraph: Several companies and research labs are working on wearable robots to help disabled people walk or to make the human body superhuman.

headline.seo: Wearable Robots That Can Help People Walk Again
headline.main: New Breed of Robotics Aims to Help People Walk Again
headline.print_headline: Robots in All Walks of Life
